text: Daniel Rossi Silva (born on 4 January 1981 in Rio Claro, São Paulo), commonly known as just Daniel Rossi or Daniel, is a former Brazilian footballer. He was a midfielder. ==Club statistics== |- |2000||Kawasaki Frontale||J.
